name: Create entity pairs
process:
hypernyms = state['hypernyms']
    #triples = state['triples']
    heads_text = [d['text'] for d in state['heads']]
    tails_text = [d['text'] for d in state['tails']]
    filter_heads = dict.fromkeys(h for h in heads_text if h not in hypernyms)
    filter_tails = dict.fromkeys(t for t in tails_text if t not in hypernyms)
    pairs = []
    for head in filter_heads:
        for tail in filter_tails:
            pairs.append((head, tail))
    state['pairs'] = pairs
